title: What is the best moment in cinema history? - Happiness & Positivity - Quora

response.answer_text: Every time good triumphs over evil. The Hunt For Red October, when Captain Ramius afirms that he wants to defect. Oh oh The Last Holiday when the Chef sits down at Georgia’s table. Or in Same Time Next Year when Alan Alda and whats hers name are sitting in the restaurant, they met and the theme song starts playing. Or how about The Intouchables when the two main characters are hang gliding. Theres too many to name..

Dear SD Thanks for entrusting me with your topic question. However it is a might broad. For my happiness and positivity-is there a way of restructuring the question? What about 1–5 from each decade up until now?
